page.title: 19NATURE AROUND THE SCHOOL
page.content: In 1984 a swarm of bees came over the swimming pool while the Juniors were swimming.A beekeeper came and took the bees away,but he killed the queen bee by accident.We also have house-martins nesting under the eaves of the Junior classroom.In the pond in the garden,we have got some young frogs.One day,in 1985,a young male blackbird came into the Junior classroom.Mrs Bruce,Simon's mum,came in and took the blackbird outside.We found some birds eggs in one of our hedges.One day we found a different bird in a house-martins nest in the out-side shed.In the Juniors classroom there are two gold-fish.One day in the Infant classroom Matthew caught a butterfly and Kate put it in a jar.From the Library,a man brings in stuffed animals and birds and puts them in our classrooms for us to look at.
